article.content:
• TEXT ORGANIZATION
Activities achieved as text organization in the following english Web documentations:

PinkPaula V2 for Fx 2 and IE

SearchStyle

SearchStyle Custom

Page of Results

PinkTabs
  • WEB TRANSLATION
Translations achieved from the english Web documentations to the following languages:

Pink Paula V2:

to the languages: portuguese, francese, spanish

SearchStyle:

to portuguese and francese

SearchStyle Custom:

to francese and portuguese

Page of Results

to francês, and português

PinkTabs:

to portuguese, francese, and spanish.
  • LITERATURE PAGE: Real and Imaginary
Share space to comments of literary works, poems, photos .. so, it's a open space for reality and imaginary things, where all ideas will be wellcome.
  • ON HIV/AIDS INTRODUCTORY
Translations achieved as freelance translator of scripts to date into Portuguese for http://aidsvideos.org/translate.shtml with the following scripts:
  • script “Better Adherence for a Better Life!" "Melhor aderência para uma vida melhor."
  • script “HIV and AIDS_Prevention for Positives” "HIV e AIDS_Prevenção para Soro-positivos."
  • script “Crystal Methamphetamine and HIV: The Connection.” “Cristal de Metanfetamina e HIV: A Conexão.
  •  script “Did I Just Contract HIV? Symptoms of Primary HIV Infection.” “Eu contraí o HIV? Sintomas primários de infecção do HIV"
  •  script “HIV - Prevention for Men who have sex with men”. (en). "HIV - Prevenção para Homens que fazem sexo com homens".(ptBR)
  •  "Introdução ao HIV e AIDS: O que você precisa saber" v. versão pt-br
  •  'The Top 10 Myths About HIV and AIDS”
  •  “Preventing Mother-to-Child Transmission of HIV/AIDS in Developed Countries: What You Need to Know”(en). “Prevenção da Transmissão do HIV/AIDS de Mãe para Filho em Países Desenvolvidos: O que você precisa saber” (ptBR)
  •  “Preventing Mother-to-Child Transmission of HIV/AIDS in Developing Countries: What You Need to Know”(en). “Prevenção à transmissão do HIV/AIDS de Mãe-para-Filho em Países em Desenvolvimento: O que você precisa saber” (ptBR)
  •  “Why EVERY Person Should Be Tested for HIV When They Visit the Doctor” (en). “Why EVERY Person Should Be Tested for HIV When They Visit the Doctor” (ptBR)
  •  “Wash Your Hands to Keep Yourself and Others Healthy: Recommendations for the Developed World.”(en). “Wash Your Hands to Keep Yourself and Others Healthy: Recommendations for the Developed World.” (ptBR)
  •  “Wash Your Hands to Keep Yourself and Others Healthy: Recommendations for the Developing World.”(en). “Lave Suas Mãos para Preservar a Sua Saúde e a dos Outros: Recomendações para o Mundo em Desenvolvimento.”(ptBR)
  •  “Preventing Waterborne Illnesses – the Major Cause of Death in Developing Countries” (en). “Prevenindo Doenças de Veiculação Hídrica – a maior causa de morte em países em desenvolvimento”(ptBR)
  •  "Preventing Sexual Transmission of HIV: What You Need to Know"(en). Prevenção de Transmissão Sexual do HIV: O que você precisa saber”(ptBR)
  • SHARE-INFORMATION - (página compartilhada)
In this page there is a space for share information, exchanging experiences, expressions and more.
  • REVISIONS
Text revisions in portuguese languages of tecnical genre, computational area - internet, for Bugzilla - AMO ( addons.mozilla.org ) site https://addons.mozilla.org/pt-BR/firefox. , it refers to a first pt-BR version, and evaluations and feedback for this work will be always wellcome. The related docs are setting in https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=380221. A text only will be completed by the help of the reader.

Portuguese Languages: Text Comprehension

Article about text comprehension in portuguese languages. In this article I followed, amoung other theories, the theoretical presuppositions of Tesnière, french linguist, Eléments de syntaxe structurale. The importance of the verbs for the better text comprehension. See the article Text Comprehension - portuguese language.
